snippet: Baseball’s career home run king and its most decorated pitcher will probably be shut out of the Hall of Fame in January.
abstract: Survey shows that Barry Bonds, Roger Clemens and Sammy Sosa do not have enough votes to get into Baseball Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Baseball’s career home run king and its most decorated pitcher will probably be shut out of the Hall of Fame in January.

headline.seo: Dim Outlook for Baseball’s Hall of Fame Candidates
headline.main: Dim Outlook for Hall of Fame Candidates
